item.title: How to create a telegram bot with Python in minutes
item.description: Creating a telegram bot with Python in minutes may seem like a clickbait title for a post, but trust me, it’s possible. If you’re going through a boring afternoon or you’re locked down due to COVID restriction and you want to do something different, keep reading and let’s create our first Python Telegram bot! :) For this project, all you will have to use is the python-telegram-bot package that’s basically a wrapper around telegram APIs.
